author: Ed Kilgore
title: Dems Get Some of the Election Funding They Wanted in Coronavirus Stimulus Bill
description: But Pelosi and Schumer didn’t secure the money or a mandate for universal access to voting by mail.
content: Of all the essential public services called into doubt by the coronavirus pandemic, voting, the most basic ritual of democracy, is among the most threatened. Its no mistake that the recent Democratic primary election held in a state (Illinois) where Election … [+5863 chars]
